extra.enrollment_requirement: PREREQUISITE  (12.0 units in POLS at the 200-level or above) and (a GPA of 2.0 on all units in POLS) or permission of the department.

basic.description: Selected topics in the critique of capitalism, e.g. Marxism, democracy, the environment, globalization, employment and popular culture.
basic.subject: POLS
basic.title: Critical Perspectives on Contemporary Capitalism
